How to install this theme

Posted in articles  and tagged sample-post on Dec 18, 2014

How to install Freshman theme?

1 # please make sure you have already installed git tools and ruby tools(gem)
2 $ gem install sass
3 $ gem install jekyll
4 $ git clone https://github.com/yulijia/freshman21.git

Then, change the folder name to you own github page name, forexample

$ mv freshman thisisyouname.github.io
